root: ^It’s been a pretty hectic day, looks like you’ve suddenly become popular!
^In fact, you’ve become a little bit too popular… You can’t be in two places at once, so you’re gonna have to make a decision.
^Do you want to help Mothman pursue his creative dreams? Or help Nessie recover her equipment so she can finish her research?
^More importantly… which creature do you want to get closer with?
